column4: Hi, Does anyone know if there is any sftp GUI ? I found nautilus does it, but I can open files only in read-only mode
gftp does that I believe, tho I find the interface a bit clunky (it works tho)
gftp does allow me to open it in gvim, edit it too.. but I think it saves it to temp folder, not edit the file at server itself, is this normal behaviour?
